column4: ill stick around waiting for flightsim to finish downloading :)
i only use windoze for playing games that i cant play in ubuntu
the only thing ubuntu misses is NTFS write support
experimental or complete?
complete
it's been around for over a year
that is normal
ath0 and wifi0 are the atheros card
one of them is a virtual interface
i'd imagine ath0 should show the true rate
you can create multiple virtual interfaces to (from what I understand) connect to multiple aps, run multiple aps and do other multiple things
hmm, didnt knew about that
i suppose wifi0 is showing ath0 rate + overhead
http://madwifi.org/wiki/ngFeatures
will read
wait, you basicly can set any number of connections using just 1 interface??
you create multiple virtual interfaces
which could be used for different types of connection
yes, from what I understand
like an AP and P2P network
yes, i imagine so
